edu.cnm.deepdive.green_print.controller

Class CC_API

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.green_print.controller.CC_API

  • public class CC_API
extends Object
    CC_API implementation of the CoolClimate API. Methods take user input by answering questions about the users energy usage on a yearly basis. Then the API calculates the users carbon footprint in terms of CO2 tons/year.
    Version:
    1.0 CoolClimate Network Information Director Christopher M. Jones, Ph.D. & University of California, Berkeley
    Author:
    Kevin Simms & Deep Dive Coding Java + Android Bootcamp cohort 6
    See Also:
    UCB, CoolClimate

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,String> calculateFootprintParams(int[] inputValues, boolean[] takeActionInputs)
      Initializes the CC_API by calling calculateFootprintParams(int[], boolean[]) to gain access to the API to perform calculations from the user input provided keys within the SurveyFragment.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateFootprintParams

        public Map<String,String> calculateFootprintParams(int[] inputValues,
                                                   boolean[] takeActionInputs)
        Initializes the CC_API by calling calculateFootprintParams(int[], boolean[]) to gain access to the API to perform calculations from the user input provided keys within the SurveyFragment. This is where the API Id and key are initialized. Calls on to fulfill state requirement in API
        Parameters:
        inputValues - user input values
        Returns:
        from API that then is parsed for the grand total to be displayed in ScoreFragment
